original:
This is a Birdhouse, isn't it...

If its pretty, then I'll love it!
translation:
This is a Birdhouse, isn't it...

If its pretty, then I'll love it!

original:
There were birds inside, and 
they're cute like me!
My EXP went up a little
translation:
There were birds inside, and 
they're cute like me!
My EXP went up a little

original:
There's nothing in here...
Not that it matters, I guess...
translation:
There's nothing in here...
Not that it matters, I guess...

original:
This is a Highjump, isn't it?

Do you think I can manage to
jump that high?
translation:
This is a Highjump, isn't it?

Do you think I can manage to
jump that high?

original:
Heheh, everyone was entranced by
my jumping skills!
My EXP went up
translation:
Heheh, everyone was entranced by
my jumping skills!
My EXP went up

original:
Wait a minute! That bar is just
a little too high for me!
translation:
Wait a minute! That bar is just
a little too high for me!

original:
This is a Diving Board, huh?

I get it, I just gotta jump off of 
this thing, right?
translation:
This is a Diving Board, huh?

I get it, I just gotta jump off of 
this thing, right?

original:
Haaah... I-I wasn't scared 
at all!
My EXP went up a lot!
translation:
Haaah... I-I wasn't scared 
at all!
My EXP went up a lot!

original:
I-I'm not gonna jump...
Not because I'm scared!
translation:
I-I'm not gonna jump...
Not because I'm scared!

original:
Isn't this a Phonograph?

This looks pretty old, will it even
still work?
translation:
Isn't this a Phonograph?

This looks pretty old, will it even
still work?

original:
Beautiful 
It'd work well as my theme song
My EXP went up a little
translation:
Beautiful 
It'd work well as my theme song
My EXP went up a little

original:
It's not running at all. Guess it's
just a piece of trash...
translation:
It's not running at all. Guess it's
just a piece of trash...

original:
Oh my! Isn't this a Holy Bell?

If I give it a ring, I'm sure it'll
let out a beautiful sound!
translation:
Oh my! Isn't this a Holy Bell?

If I give it a ring, I'm sure it'll
let out a beautiful sound!

original:
Ahhh... What beautiful sound 
quality...
My EXP went up
translation:
Ahhh... What beautiful sound 
quality...
My EXP went up

original:
There's no sound...?
What's going on here?!
translation:
There's no sound...?
What's going on here?!

original:
Isn't this Stonehenge?

I wonder what will happen
if I walk through it?
translation:
Isn't this Stonehenge?

I wonder what will happen
if I walk through it?

original:
Oh my, I feel Holy Power rushing
through my body!
My EXP went up a lot!
translation:
Oh my, I feel Holy Power rushing
through my body!
My EXP went up a lot!

original:
Nothing happened...
That's a little disappointing...
translation:
Nothing happened...
That's a little disappointing...

original:
Whoa, what's this?!
Looks terrible!
translation:
Whoa, what's this?!
Looks terrible!

original:
Wait a minute! This is Dark 
Medicine, isn't it?!
My EXP went up a little
translation:
Wait a minute! This is Dark 
Medicine, isn't it?!
My EXP went up a little

original:
I-I've had enough!
I'm outta here!
translation:
I-I've had enough!
I'm outta here!

original:
W-what could this weird 
presence be...?
W-wait a minute! This is a 
Cursed Chest, isn't it?!
translation:
W-what could this weird 
presence be...?
W-wait a minute! This is a 
Cursed Chest, isn't it?!

original:
I-I can feel incredible Dark
Power...!
My EXP went up
translation:
I-I can feel incredible Dark
Power...!
My EXP went up

original:
I-I can't get this thing open!
I'll have to leave at this rate!
translation:
I-I can't get this thing open!
I'll have to leave at this rate!

original:
Could this be a Dark Tower?!

Alright then, I'll go investigate...!
translation:
Could this be a Dark Tower?!

Alright then, I'll go investigate...!

original:
No doubt about it, this is a real
deal Dark Tower!
My EXP went up a lot!
translation:
No doubt about it, this is a real
deal Dark Tower!
My EXP went up a lot!

original:
Oh my, I don't feel a thing...
This was kinda pointless
translation:
Oh my, I don't feel a thing...
This was kinda pointless

original:
Oh my, what's this?

I can smell something incredibly
sweet nearby...!
translation:
Oh my, what's this?

I can smell something incredibly
sweet nearby...!

original:
My, my! This is ^P's
scent, isn't it!
Next time they're here, I'd love to
spend some time with them
My Friendship level went up a little
translation:
My, my! This is ^P's
scent, isn't it!
Next time they're here, I'd love to
spend some time with them
My Friendship level went up a little

original:
Recently I've been feeling so lovely
and happy
And it's all thanks to ^P's
hard work, obviously!
That's why I've gotta offer some
special praise!
translation:
Recently I've been feeling so lovely
and happy
And it's all thanks to ^P's
hard work, obviously!
That's why I've gotta offer some
special praise!

original:
"Dear ^P.
You've been working so hard!
Please continue doing your
best out there!"
I'm sure my feelings will get
through to ^P!
My Friendship level skyrocketed!
translation:
"Dear ^P.
You've been working so hard!
Please continue doing your
best out there!"
I'm sure my feelings will get
through to ^P!
My Friendship level skyrocketed!

original: Oh my, what could this be?
translation: Oh my, what could this be?

original:
Isn't this... 100 Bit?!

I better give this to ^P
right away!
They'll be so thankful to me!
translation:
Isn't this... 100 Bit?!

I better give this to ^P
right away!
They'll be so thankful to me!

original: Oh my, what could this be?
translation: Oh my, what could this be?

original:
Isn't this... 500 Bit?!
How lucky!
I better give this to ^P
right away!
They'll be really thankful to me!
translation:
Isn't this... 500 Bit?!
How lucky!
I better give this to ^P
right away!
They'll be really thankful to me!

original: Oh my, what could this be?
translation: Oh my, what could this be?

original:
Isn't this... 1000 Bit?!
Amazing!!
I better give this to ^P
right away!
They'll be incredibly thankful to 
me!
translation:
Isn't this... 1000 Bit?!
Amazing!!
I better give this to ^P
right away!
They'll be incredibly thankful to 
me!

original:
Oh my, those Wild Strawberries
look so delicious!
I'm gonna give them a taste
translation:
Oh my, those Wild Strawberries
look so delicious!
I'm gonna give them a taste

original:
Those were pretty tasty!
I'll give them a passing grade!
My EXP went up
translation:
Those were pretty tasty!
I'll give them a passing grade!
My EXP went up

original:
Jeez! Why would you let me
eat such things?!
translation:
Jeez! Why would you let me
eat such things?!

original:
Oh my, that's a Big Tree!
Looks like I could climb it.
translation:
Oh my, that's a Big Tree!
Looks like I could climb it.

original:
Heheh! It feels great being up so
high!
My EXP went up a little.
translation:
Heheh! It feels great being up so
high!
My EXP went up a little.

original:
Hey, don't let me do something 
like that.
translation:
Hey, don't let me do something 
like that.

original: Oh my, isn't this a Tree Stump?
translation: Oh my, isn't this a Tree Stump?

original:
Standing up here is just perfect
for me!
My EXP went up
translation:
Standing up here is just perfect
for me!
My EXP went up

original: What the-? This is just boring!
translation: What the-? This is just boring!

original:
That there is Delicious Sap, right?

I think I'll give it a taste...
translation:
That there is Delicious Sap, right?

I think I'll give it a taste...

original:
Oh my, it's so sweet and delicious!

My EXP went up a lot!
translation:
Oh my, it's so sweet and delicious!

My EXP went up a lot!

original:
Jeez! It's so sticky it's difficult
to get a taste!
translation:
Jeez! It's so sticky it's difficult
to get a taste!

original:
Max HP went up!
^6 → ^7
translation:
Max HP went up!
^6 → ^7

original:
Max MP went up!
^6 → ^7
translation:
Max MP went up!
^6 → ^7

original:
Attack went up!
^6 → ^7
translation:
Attack went up!
^6 → ^7

original:
Defense went up!
^6 → ^7
translation:
Defense went up!
^6 → ^7

original:
Speed went up!
^6 → ^7
translation:
Speed went up!
^6 → ^7

original:
Friendship went up!
^6 → ^7
translation:
Friendship went up!
^6 → ^7

original:
Oh-ho, these are Scales.

To tell the truth, I've in fact been
on a diet recently.
translation:
Oh-ho, these are Scales.

To tell the truth, I've in fact been
on a diet recently.

original:
Oh, I'm thinner than before!
Seems my diet's paying off!
My Max HP increased a little.
translation:
Oh, I'm thinner than before!
Seems my diet's paying off!
My Max HP increased a little.

original:
Aah! I'm overweight!
I...I'm shocked!
translation:
Aah! I'm overweight!
I...I'm shocked!

original:
This is a Belt Machine, huh.

I can use this to temper my body's
muscles.
translation:
This is a Belt Machine, huh.

I can use this to temper my body's
muscles.

original:
Whew, that was a good 
workout...
My Max HP increased.
translation:
Whew, that was a good 
workout...
My Max HP increased.

original:
I... I can't stop shaking!
Did I overdo it, I wonder?
translation:
I... I can't stop shaking!
Did I overdo it, I wonder?

original:
Oh, there's a Treadmill here.

I'll take a run and shed some of
this weight.
translation:
Oh, there's a Treadmill here.

I'll take a run and shed some of
this weight.

original:
Whew, I already feel much lighter!

My Max HP increased a lot!
translation:
Whew, I already feel much lighter!

My Max HP increased a lot!

original:
Ahh, it hurts!
My feet are getting tangled...
translation:
Ahh, it hurts!
My feet are getting tangled...

original:
That appears to be a Crystal
Ball, correct?
It's quite beautiful, and completely
transparent!
translation:
That appears to be a Crystal
Ball, correct?
It's quite beautiful, and completely
transparent!

original:
Oh! I believe I saw something
shiny for a second there!
My Max MP increased a little!
translation:
Oh! I believe I saw something
shiny for a second there!
My Max MP increased a little!

original:
However... nothing's happening.
Guess it's just a decoration.
translation:
However... nothing's happening.
Guess it's just a decoration.

original:
Seems there's something here.
Let's take a look...
Oh these... are Tarot Cards.
translation:
Seems there's something here.
Let's take a look...
Oh these... are Tarot Cards.

original:
...Oh, I can feel the Magical
power...
My Max MP increased!
translation:
...Oh, I can feel the Magical
power...
My Max MP increased!

original:
Unfortunately I have no idea how
to use these...
translation:
Unfortunately I have no idea how
to use these...

original:
This is a Pyramid, isn't it?

Since I'm here, I may as well take
a look inside...
translation:
This is a Pyramid, isn't it?

Since I'm here, I may as well take
a look inside...

original:
I can feel a sort of mysterious
and strong power...!
My Max MP increased a lot!
translation:
I can feel a sort of mysterious
and strong power...!
My Max MP increased a lot!

original:
Ah, seems I've gotten myself lost.
I can't see a thing...
translation:
Ah, seems I've gotten myself lost.
I can't see a thing...

original:
This is a Sandbag, isn't it?

I'm not a huge fan of strength
training, to be completely honest...
translation:
This is a Sandbag, isn't it?

I'm not a huge fan of strength
training, to be completely honest...

original:
I unconciously went all out for a bit
there... how embarassing...
My Attack increased a little.
translation:
I unconciously went all out for a bit
there... how embarassing...
My Attack increased a little.

original:
...As I suspected, I just don't 
enjoy such rambunctious things.
translation:
...As I suspected, I just don't 
enjoy such rambunctious things.

original:
This is a Large Tree used for
training, huh.
I-I wonder if a Digimon like me can
really succeed with this training...
translation:
This is a Large Tree used for
training, huh.
I-I wonder if a Digimon like me can
really succeed with this training...

original:
Oh-ho, that went better than I 
expected...?!
My attack increased a lot!
translation:
Oh-ho, that went better than I 
expected...?!
My attack increased a lot!

original:
As I suspected, it's no use.
I'm just not good at this.
translation:
As I suspected, it's no use.
I'm just not good at this.

original:
What's a Giant Rock doing in
a place like this...?
I-I must move it...?
That's impossible...
translation:
What's a Giant Rock doing in
a place like this...?
I-I must move it...?
That's impossible...

original:
Huh... It moved easier than I
had expected...
My attack increased a lot!
translation:
Huh... It moved easier than I
had expected...
My attack increased a lot!

original:
A-as I suspected... it didn't move
an inch...
translation:
A-as I suspected... it didn't move
an inch...

original:
T-this is a Punching Machine...

I-I understand...
I just need to take some hits...
translation:
T-this is a Punching Machine...

I-I understand...
I just need to take some hits...

original:
It hurt, but I managed to 
withstand it.
My defense increased a little.
translation:
It hurt, but I managed to 
withstand it.
My defense increased a little.

original:
I-it hurts too much!
Please let's stop this!
translation:
I-it hurts too much!
Please let's stop this!

original:
Ah, this is a Cannon used for
special training...
D-don't tell me you expect me to
withstand cannonballs...?
translation:
Ah, this is a Cannon used for
special training...
D-don't tell me you expect me to
withstand cannonballs...?

original:
H-haaah... I somehow succeeded...

My defense increased!
translation:
H-haaah... I somehow succeeded...

My defense increased!

original:
Uwah! Ouch!
I can't keep this up!
translation:
Uwah! Ouch!
I can't keep this up!

original:
I-I understand... I just need to
withstand this Iron Ball...
translation:
I-I understand... I just need to
withstand this Iron Ball...

original:
I'm relieved... I somehow managed
to succeed...!
My defense increased a lot!
translation:
I'm relieved... I somehow managed
to succeed...!
My defense increased a lot!

original:
Unfortunately this truly is 
impossible for me...
translation:
Unfortunately this truly is 
impossible for me...

original:
This is Side Stepping training.
I'll try it out!
translation:
This is Side Stepping training.
I'll try it out!

original:
To tell the truth, I'm actually 
pretty good at this kind of thing...!
My speed increased a lot.
translation:
To tell the truth, I'm actually 
pretty good at this kind of thing...!
My speed increased a lot.

original:
Ahhh... I'm too heavy, I was 
unable to jump very high...
translation:
Ahhh... I'm too heavy, I was 
unable to jump very high...

original:
Oh, there's even a Trampoline in
in this place...
Since it's here, I may as well give
it a try!
translation:
Oh, there's even a Trampoline in
in this place...
Since it's here, I may as well give
it a try!

original:
Bouncing around in the air felt
pretty good, I must say.
My speed increased a lot.
translation:
Bouncing around in the air felt
pretty good, I must say.
My speed increased a lot.

original:
O-oh no... I'm too heavy and
couldn't bounce very high...
translation:
O-oh no... I'm too heavy and
couldn't bounce very high...

original:
This is...
A Hamster Wheel, huh.
I'll get in and try going for a run...!
translation:
This is...
A Hamster Wheel, huh.
I'll get in and try going for a run...!

original:
Haaah! This turned out to be some
good exercise.
My speed increased a lot!
translation:
Haaah! This turned out to be some
good exercise.
My speed increased a lot!

original:
S-sorry about this, but I'm too
fatigued to continue...
translation:
S-sorry about this, but I'm too
fatigued to continue...
